contact.contactDesc: Do you face any problem, have a suggestion or complain? we would love to hear from you. Just fill the form below, or contact us on our Mobile, Email mentioned in this page.
contact.Name: Name

login.loginDesc1: Hello sir, nice to see you again!
login.loginDesc2: Please insert your login info below to proceed
login.PasswordValidation: Password length must be at least 9 characters long.
login.InsertEmail: Please insert your email address and we’ll send a link to reset your password
login.reactiveRequestMSG: Your account is currently deactivated, would you like to send a Reactivation request to Antim?

SignUp.SignUpDesc1: Very Easy and straight forward steps to register.
SignUp.FirstNameValidate: First Name must contains only characters.
SignUp.LastNameValidate: Last Name must contains only characters.
SignUp.UsernameValidate: User Name must be at least 5 characters long.
SignUp.ProperUsername: The username must contains only the English alphabet, letters and special characters
SignUp.NationalIDValidate: National ID number must be at least 10 characters long.
SignUp.PasswordValidate: Password must contain Upper Cases Letter, Lower Cases Letter, Numbers, Special Characters (!, @, _, #, $ ..etc.) and at least 9 characters long.
SignUp.MobileNoValidate: Phone number must be at least 9 characters long.
SignUp.SignUpNextstepDesc1: just to be sure, Please enter your verification code to verify your
SignUp.approveTheFollow: The last thing, Please approve the below

Setting.DeleteAccountMsg: If you want to delete you account, you will not be able to log in again, and you must register again to request funding.
Setting.DeactivateAccountMsg: Do you Really want to deactivate your account?

Profile.ProfileDescription: Well !! just to be sure, Please enter your verification code to verify your
Profile.TypeOldPasswordValidation: Old Password must contain Upper Cases Letter, Lower Cases Letter, Numbers, Special Characters (!, @, _, #, $ ..etc.) and at least 9 characters long.
Profile.TypeNewPasswordValidation: New Password must contain Upper Cases Letter, Lower Cases Letter, Numbers, Special Characters (!, @, _, #, $ ..etc.) and at least 9 characters long.
Profile.BankAccountNumberValidation2: Bank AccountNo length must be greater than 10  and less than 25.
Profile.AccountTitleValidation2: Account Title must be at least 6 characters long.
Profile.BankAddressValidation2: Bank Address must be at least 10 characters long.
Profile.AddressVlidation: Address must be at least 6 characters long.
Profile.cityValidations: city must be at least 4 characters long.
Profile.CountryValidation: country must be at least 4 characters long.
Profile.YourStateValidations: state must be at least 4 characters long.
Profile.IBANNumberValidation: IBAN Number must start with 'SA' + 24 digits.
Profile.FundingLimitValidation: Funding Limit must be between 500 SAR to 10000 SAR.
Profile.DeleteAccountFileConfirm: Do You really Want to Delete this Account Statement File?
Profile.DeleteSalaryFileConfirm: Do You really Want to Delete this Salary Statement File?

CreateOrder.CreateOrderDesc: Well, it is very easy to make a request, just follow the below step and we will take care of it!
CreateOrder.RequestNameValidation: Request Name must be at least 6 characters long.
CreateOrder.CreateOrderNote: Please make sure that Total Price must be greater than 500 SAR and less than 10000 SAR.
CreateOrder.Theinformationselected: The information selected at the top is subject to change based on your credit record and your premitted amount of SIMAH. We will call you if any change is made within a period not exceeding one hour.
CreateOrder.IagreeRequstName: I agree on purchasing the request name :
CreateOrder.showingRequestScreen: showing in the request screen. and with the price showing in the request screen.
CreateOrder.PleaseBoteCancel: , please note that, you can cancel the request while the status is 'Under Review'. However, if the request has been approved, then you will no longer be able to Cancel it.
CreateOrder.PickUptheProducts: Pick up the products from Antim offices by myself
CreateOrder.SelectingadditionalDelivery: Selecting this option will require you to pay additional delivery fees of
CreateOrder.ThankyourequestSuccessfully: Your request has been Successfully sent, and will be verified if you are qualified for funding and will be responded to within 30 minutes
